verses.text: It \w pleased|strong="H6925"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* to \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6243"\w* \w princes|strong="H0324"\w*, which should \w be|strong="H1934"\w* over the \w whole|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*;

And \w over|strong="H5924"\w* \w these|strong="H4481"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w presidents|strong="H5632"\w*; of \w whom|strong="H4481"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \add was\add* \w first|strong="H2298"\w*: \w that|strong="H0459"\w* the \w princes|strong="H0324"\w* \w might|strong="H1934"\w* \w give|strong="H3052"\w* \w accounts|strong="H2941"\w* unto them, and the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* should \w have|strong="H1934"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w damage|strong="H5142"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w preferred|strong="H5330"\w* \w above|strong="H5922"\w* the \w presidents|strong="H5632"\w* and \w princes|strong="H0324"\w*, \w because|strong="H3606"\w* an \w excellent|strong="H3493"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \add was\add* in him; and the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w thought|strong="H6246"\w* to \w set|strong="H6966"\w* him \w over|strong="H5922"\w* the \w whole|strong="H3606"\w* \w realm|strong="H4437"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* the \w presidents|strong="H5632"\w* and \w princes|strong="H0324"\w* \w sought|strong="H1934"\w* to \w find|strong="H7912"\w* \w occasion|strong="H5931"\w* against \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w concerning|strong="H6655"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*; \w but|strong="H3606"\w* they \w could|strong="H3202"\w* \w find|strong="H7912"\w* \w none|strong="H3809"\w* \w occasion|strong="H5931"\w* \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w fault|strong="H7844"\w*; \w forasmuch|strong="H6903"\w* as he \add was\add* \w faithful|strong="H0540"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3809"\w* was there \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w error|strong="H7960"\w* or \w fault|strong="H7844"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* in \w him|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, We shall \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w find|strong="H7912"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w occasion|strong="H5931"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w except|strong="H3861"\w* we \w find|strong="H7912"\w* \add it\add* against him concerning the \w law|strong="H1882"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w these|strong="H0459"\w* \w presidents|strong="H5632"\w* and \w princes|strong="H0324"\w* assembled \w together|strong="H7284"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* unto \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, \w live|strong="H2418"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*.\f + \fr 6.6 \ft assembled…: or, came tumultuously\f*

\w All|strong="H3606"\w* the \w presidents|strong="H5632"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, the \w governors|strong="H5460"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H0324"\w*, the \w counsellors|strong="H1907"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H6347"\w*, have consulted \w together|strong="H3272"\w* to \w establish|strong="H6966"\w* a \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* \w statute|strong="H7010"\w*, and to make a \w firm|strong="H8631"\w* \w decree|strong="H0633"\w*, that whosoever shall \w ask|strong="H1156"\w* a \w petition|strong="H1159"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* or \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w thirty|strong="H8533"\w* \w days|strong="H3118"\w*, \w save|strong="H3861"\w* of \w thee|strong="H4481"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, he shall be \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* into the \w den|strong="H1358"\w* of \w lions|strong="H0744"\w*.\f + \fr 6.7 \ft decree: or, interdict\f*

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w establish|strong="H6966"\w* the \w decree|strong="H0633"\w*, and \w sign|strong="H7560"\w* the \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, that it be \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*, according to the \w law|strong="H1882"\w* of the \w Medes|strong="H4076"\w* and \w Persians|strong="H6540"\w*, which \w altereth|strong="H5709"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w*.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft altereth not: Chaldee, passeth not\f*
\w Wherefore|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w signed|strong="H7560"\w* the \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* and the \w decree|strong="H0633"\w*.

¶ Now when \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w knew|strong="H3046"\w* that the \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* was \w signed|strong="H7560"\w*, he \w went|strong="H5954"\w* into his \w house|strong="H1005"\w*; and his \w windows|strong="H3551"\w* being \w open|strong="H6606"\w* in his \w chamber|strong="H5952"\w* \w toward|strong="H5049"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, he \w kneeled|strong="H1289"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* his \w knees|strong="H1291"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w times|strong="H2166"\w* a \w day|strong="H3118"\w*, and \w prayed|strong="H6739"\w*, and gave \w thanks|strong="H3029"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* his \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w as|strong="H6903"\w* he \w did|strong="H1934"\w* \w aforetime|strong="H4481"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w assembled|strong="H7284"\w*, and \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w praying|strong="H1156"\w* and making \w supplication|strong="H2604"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* his \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* they came \w near|strong="H7127"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H0560"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w decree|strong="H0633"\w*; Hast thou \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w signed|strong="H7560"\w* a \w decree|strong="H0633"\w*, that \w every|strong="H3606"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w* that shall \w ask|strong="H1156"\w* \add a petition\add* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* or \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w within|strong="H5705"\w* \w thirty|strong="H8533"\w* \w days|strong="H3118"\w*, \w save|strong="H3861"\w* of \w thee|strong="H4481"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, shall be \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* into the \w den|strong="H1358"\w* of \w lions|strong="H0744"\w*? The \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, The \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* \add is\add* \w true|strong="H3330"\w*, according to the \w law|strong="H1882"\w* of the \w Medes|strong="H4076"\w* and \w Persians|strong="H6540"\w*, which \w altereth|strong="H5709"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* they and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, That \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, which \add is\add* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w children|strong="H1123"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H1547"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*, \w regardeth|strong="H7761"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, nor the \w decree|strong="H0633"\w* that thou hast \w signed|strong="H7560"\w*, but \w maketh|strong="H1156"\w* his \w petition|strong="H1159"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w times|strong="H2166"\w* a \w day|strong="H3118"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, when he \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* \add these\add* \w words|strong="H4406"\w*, was \w sore|strong="H7690"\w* \w displeased|strong="H0888"\w* with himself, and \w set|strong="H7761"\w* \add his\add* \w heart|strong="H1079"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H7804"\w* him: and he \w laboured|strong="H1934"\w* \w till|strong="H5705"\w* the going \w down|strong="H4606"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8122"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H5338"\w* him.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w assembled|strong="H7284"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w Know|strong="H3046"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, that the \w law|strong="H1882"\w* of the \w Medes|strong="H4076"\w* and \w Persians|strong="H6540"\w* \add is\add*, That \w no|strong="H3606"\w* \w decree|strong="H0633"\w* nor \w statute|strong="H7010"\w* which the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w establisheth|strong="H6966"\w* may be \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w*, and they \w brought|strong="H0858"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* \add him\add* into the \w den|strong="H1358"\w* of \w lions|strong="H0744"\w*. \add Now\add* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* unto \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, Thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w* whom \w thou|strong="H0607"\w* \w servest|strong="H6399"\w* \w continually|strong="H8411"\w*, he will \w deliver|strong="H7804"\w* thee.

And \w a|strong="H2298"\w* \w stone|strong="H0069"\w* was \w brought|strong="H0858"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7761"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* the \w mouth|strong="H6433"\w* of the \w den|strong="H1358"\w*; and the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2857"\w* it with his own \w signet|strong="H5824"\w*, and with the \w signet|strong="H5824"\w* of his \w lords|strong="H7261"\w*; that the \w purpose|strong="H6640"\w* might \w not|strong="H3809"\w* be \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* concerning \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w went|strong="H0236"\w* to his \w palace|strong="H1965"\w*, and passed the \w night|strong="H0956"\w* \w fasting|strong="H2908"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3809"\w* were \w instruments|strong="H1761"\w* of musick \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* him: and his \w sleep|strong="H8139"\w* \w went|strong="H5075"\w* from \w him|strong="H5922"\w*.\f + \fr 6.18 \ft instruments…: or, table\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w arose|strong="H6966"\w* very \w early|strong="H8238"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H5053"\w*, and \w went|strong="H0236"\w* in \w haste|strong="H0927"\w* unto the \w den|strong="H1358"\w* of \w lions|strong="H0744"\w*.

And when he \w came|strong="H7127"\w* to the \w den|strong="H1358"\w*, he \w cried|strong="H2200"\w* with a \w lamentable|strong="H6088"\w* \w voice|strong="H7032"\w* unto \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*: \add and\add* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* to \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, O \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w servant|strong="H5649"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2417"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, is thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, whom thou \w servest|strong="H6399"\w* \w continually|strong="H8411"\w*, \w able|strong="H3202"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H7804"\w* thee \w from|strong="H4481"\w* the \w lions|strong="H0744"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w said|strong="H4449"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w unto|strong="H5974"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w live|strong="H2418"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*.

My \w God|strong="H0426"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* his \w angel|strong="H4398"\w*, and hath \w shut|strong="H5463"\w* the \w lions’|strong="H0744"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6433"\w*, that they have \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w hurt|strong="H2255"\w* me: forasmuch \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* him \w innocency|strong="H2136"\w* was \w found|strong="H7912"\w* in me; and \w also|strong="H0638"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* thee, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, have I \w done|strong="H5648"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w hurt|strong="H2248"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* was the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H7690"\w* \w glad|strong="H2868"\w* for \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, and \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* that they should \w take|strong="H5267"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w up|strong="H5267"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w den|strong="H1358"\w*. So \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* was taken \w up|strong="H5267"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w den|strong="H1358"\w*, and \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w manner|strong="H3606"\w* of \w hurt|strong="H2257"\w* was \w found|strong="H7912"\w* upon him, because he \w believed|strong="H0540"\w* in his \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w*, and they \w brought|strong="H0858"\w* \w those|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* which had \w accused|strong="H0399"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, and they \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* \add them\add* into the \w den|strong="H1358"\w* of \w lions|strong="H0744"\w*, \w them|strong="H0581"\w*, their \w children|strong="H1123"\w*, and their \w wives|strong="H5389"\w*; and the \w lions|strong="H0744"\w* had the \w mastery|strong="H5705"\w* of them, and \w brake|strong="H1855"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* their \w bones|strong="H1635"\w* in \w pieces|strong="H1855"\w* or \w ever|strong="H3809"\w* they \w came|strong="H4291"\w* at the \w bottom|strong="H0773"\w* of the \w den|strong="H1358"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w* unto \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, \w nations|strong="H0524"\w*, and \w languages|strong="H3961"\w*, that \w dwell|strong="H1753"\w* in \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*; \w Peace|strong="H8001"\w* be \w multiplied|strong="H7680"\w* unto you.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w make|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*, That in \w every|strong="H3606"\w* \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* of my \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* men \w tremble|strong="H1934"\w* and \w fear|strong="H1763"\w* \w before|strong="H4481"\w* the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*: for he \add is\add* the \w living|strong="H2417"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, and \w stedfast|strong="H7011"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*, and his \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \add that\add* which shall \w not|strong="H3809"\w* be \w destroyed|strong="H2255"\w*, and his \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* \add shall be even\add* \w unto|strong="H5705"\w* the \w end|strong="H5491"\w*.

He \w delivereth|strong="H7804"\w* and \w rescueth|strong="H5338"\w*, and he \w worketh|strong="H5648"\w* \w signs|strong="H0852"\w* and \w wonders|strong="H8540"\w* in \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* and in \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, who hath \w delivered|strong="H7804"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* the \w power|strong="H3028"\w* of the \w lions|strong="H0744"\w*.\f + \fr 6.27 \ft power: Chaldee, hand\f*

So \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w prospered|strong="H6744"\w* in the \w reign|strong="H4437"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, and in the \w reign|strong="H4437"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* the \w Persian|strong="H6543"\w*.
